column3: ISEG - Lisbon School of Economics and Management
column5: OBJECTIVESThe MSc in Economics aims to provide:advanced knowledge in the field of economic theory; metodologies and techniques needed to the analysis and research in the fields of theoretical and applied economics;adequate instruments to pursuing the study of economics at the PhD level (this MSc gives direct access to the doctoral programme in Economics at ISEG).DESIGNED FORThe MSc in Economics is intended to complement and to deepen first-cycle education provided by a first-cycle degree in economics. The main objectives are that the students reach advanced knowledge in economic theory and in the methods and empirical techniques useful to analyze economic reality.
